notes: obviously a wrong reading for akukkukajāta
example_1_y: so tattha passeyya mahantaṃ kadalikkhandhaṃ ujuṃ navaṃ akukkuṭajātaṃ. tam'enaṃ mūle chindeyya, mūle chetvā agge chindeyya, agge chetvā pattavaṭṭiṃ vinibbhujeyya. so tattha pattavaṭṭiṃ vinibbhujanto pheggum'pi n'ādhigaccheyya, kuto sāraṃ?
commentary_y: (MNa) akukkukajātan'ti pupphaggahaṇakāle anto aṅguṭṭhappamāṇo eko ghanadaṇḍako nibbattati, tena virahitan'ti attho

notes: acc. as adv. of manner. SCPN §52
meaning_2_y: in the way of eating of figs
ru_notes: вин. как наречие образа действия. SCPN §52

notes: five vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti
meaning_1_y: liberation by (elmination of the opposite of) that factor
commentary_y: (MNa) anicc'ānupassan'ādikā satta anupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīk'aṅgavasena paricattāhi niccasaññ'ādīhi vimuttattā tadaṅgavimuttī'ti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
ru_meaning_raw: освобождение через (устранение противоположности) этого фактора; досл. освобождение этого фактора
ru_notes: пять vimutti 1 vikkhambhanavimutti, 2 tadaṅgavimutti, 3 samucchedavimutti, 4 paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5 nissaraṇavimutti

example_1_x: kissa rodathā'ti ca mātāpitūhi vuttā ime nimmātāpitikā tāpasapositā amhe atīva paharantī'ti vadanti. tato tesaṃ mātāpitaro ime dārakā aññe dārake viheṭhenti dukkhāpenti, na ime saṅgahetabbā, vajjitabbā ime'ti āhaṃsu.
synonym_x: ārambhati, upahanti, khanati, tāpayati, paritāpeti, bādheti, byāpajjati, byābādheti, vihiṃsati, hanati, hiṃsati
ru_meaning_raw: причиняет боль; причиняет вред; наносит ущерб
ru_notes: в действительности отымённое слово от dukkha

notes: five vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti
commentary_y: (MNa) nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttī'ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
ru_notes: пять vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti

notes: five vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti
meaning_1_y: liberation by complete calming; freedom by stilling
commentary_y: (MNa) cattāri sāmaññaphalāni magg'ānubhāvena kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhante uppannattā paṭippassaddhivimuttī'ti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
ru_meaning_raw: освобождение через полное успокоение; свобода через успокоение
ru_notes: пять vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti

notes: five vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti
meaning_1_y: liberation by extermination; freedom by eradication
commentary_y: (MNa) cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṃ samucchinnehi kilesehi vimuttattā samucchedavimuttī'ti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
ru_meaning_raw: освобождение путем уничтожения; свобода через искоренение
ru_notes: пять vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti

notes: five vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti
meaning_1_y: liberation by immobilizing; freedom by suppressing
commentary_y: (MNa) tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitehi nīvaraṇ'ādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttī'ti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
ru_meaning_raw: освобождение путём обездвиживания; свобода путём подавления
ru_notes: пять vimutti 1. vikkhambhanavimutti, 2. tadaṅgavimutti, 3. samucchedavimutti, 4. paṭippassaddhivimutti, 5. nissaraṇavimutti

notes: In Vedānta, the assertion that all things are Brahma.
meaning_1_y: the statement 'I am a Brahman'; the assertion of being a Brahman
example_1_y: yo brāhmaṇo bāhitapāpadhammo, nihuṃhuṅko nikkasāvo yat'atto, ved'antagū vūsitabrahmacariyo, dhammena so brahmavādaṃ vadeyya, yass'ussadā n'atthi kuhiñci loke'ti.
commentary_y: (NPa) dhammena so brahmavādaṃ vadeyyā'ti so brāhmaṇo ahan'ti etaṃ vādaṃ vadeyya. (NPt) so brāhmaṇo brahmavādaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇo'mhī'ti vācaṃ vadeyyā'ti bhagavā avocā'ti yojanā.
ru_meaning_raw: утверждение «Я есть Брахман»; утверждение о том, что кто-то является Брахманом
ru_notes: [пер. ИИ] В духовной философии Веданта утверждение, что все вещи - это Брама
